00011     template<typename T>
00012     class Stat
00013     {
00014             T mBase;
00015             T mModified;
00016 
00017         public:
00018             typedef T Type;
00019 
00020             Stat() : mBase (0), mModified (0) {}
00021             Stat(T base) : mBase (base), mModified (base) {}
00022             Stat(T base, T modified) : mBase (base), mModified (modified) {}
00023 
00024             const T& getBase() const
00025             {
00026                 return mBase;
00027             }
00028 
00029             const T& getModified() const
00030             {
00031                 return mModified;
00032             }
00033 
00035             void set (const T& value)
00036             {
00037                 mBase = mModified = value;
00038             }
00039 
00041             void setBase (const T& value)
00042             {
00043                 T diff = value - mBase;
00044                 mBase = value;
00045                 mModified += diff;
00046             }
00047 
00049             void setModified (T value, const T& min, const T& max = std::numeric_limits<T>::max())
00050             {
00051                 T diff = value - mModified;
00052 
00053                 if (mBase+diff<min)
00054                 {
00055                     value = min + (mModified - mBase);
00056                     diff = value - mModified;
00057                 }
00058                 else if (mBase+diff>max)
00059                 {
00060                     value = max + (mModified - mBase);
00061                     diff = value - mModified;
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 mModified = value;
00065                 mBase += diff;
00066             }
00067 
00069             void modify (const T& diff)
00070             {
00071                 mModified += diff;
00072             }
00073     };
00074 
00075     template<typename T>
00076     inline bool operator== (const Stat<T>& left, const Stat<T>& right)
00077     {
00078         return left.getBase()==right.getBase() &&
00079             left.getModified()==right.getModified();
00080     }
00081 
00082     template<typename T>
00083     inline bool operator!= (const Stat<T>& left, const Stat<T>& right)
00084     {
00085         return !(left==right);
00086     }

00088     template<typename T>
00089     class DynamicStat
00090     {
00091             Stat<T> mStatic;
00092             T mCurrent;
00093 
00094         public:
00095             typedef T Type;
00096 
00097             DynamicStat() : mCurrent (0) {}
00098             DynamicStat(T current) : mCurrent (current) {}
00099             DynamicStat(T base, T modified, T current) : mStatic(base, modified), mCurrent (current) {}
00100             DynamicStat(const Stat<T> &stat, T current) : mStatic(stat), mCurrent (current) {}
00101 
00102             const T& getBase() const
00103             {
00104                 return mStatic.getBase();
00105             }

00108             {
00109                 return mStatic.getModified();
00110             }

00113             {
00114                 return mCurrent;
00115             }

00119             {
00120                 mStatic.set (value);
00121                 mCurrent = value;
00122             }
00123 
00125             void setBase (const T& value)
00126             {
00127                 mStatic.setBase (value);
00128 
00129                 if (mCurrent>getModified())
00130                     mCurrent = getModified();
00131             }
00132 
00134             void setModified (T value, const T& min, const T& max = std::numeric_limits<T>::max())
00135             {
00136                 mStatic.setModified (value, min, max);
00137 
00138                 if (mCurrent>getModified())
00139                     mCurrent = getModified();
00140             }
00141 
00143             void modify (const T& diff)
00144             {
00145                 mStatic.modify (diff);
00146                 modifyCurrent (diff);
00147             }
00148 
00149             void setCurrent (const T& value)
00150             {
00151                 mCurrent = value;
00152 
00153                 if (mCurrent<0)
00154                     mCurrent = 0;
00155                 else if (mCurrent>getModified())
00156                     mCurrent = getModified();
00157             }
00158     };
